Info-booth.introduction: For more than 10 years, Völkin' regional conference has been the source for education and peer-to-peer exchange for all things enterprise IT and infrastructure. Now, we are finally going international to share the knowledge across the world.
Info-booth.industry: We know the industry has been disrupted and has accelerated trends in ways we didn’t see coming. It’s time to embrace the change in order to thrive in the future. We want to get back to the business of connecting people, ideas and opportunities. We also know that you want answers and insights on what the future holds for your careers and businesses.
